Text: is this in sync cause i've yet to see a release by this group that is in sync

@mrwolfy - maybe you should get a decent computer if you're having problems with syncing, I've never once had a problem with syncing from VTV.  The only problem I've had is that occasionally the credits get cut off.
it's not VTV i'm complaining about it's POW4 releases, everyone of their releases i've downloaded has been out of sync.
